duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the global account management team, serving as the primary client contact and overseeing key projects.
Communicate regularly with clients to set project expectations, negotiate deliverables, and address issues proactively.
Collaborate with internal and external teams to provide business and consumer insights for seamless, breakthrough, on-strategy work.
Manage go-to-market plan and calendar, overseeing multiple workstreams across channels.
Make suggestions for broadening the range of strategies and tactics employed on projects and brands.
Maintain quality assurance and develop ideas for continuous improvement across all activities.
Guide, advise, and inspire team members with the goal of developing the next generation of account management talent.
Manage project scope and define resource requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Advertising, Marketing, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
